HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. It showcases Dyson products and provides navigation to different product categories and support resources.

elements.name: Search Products
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care Link
elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifiers page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

elements.name: Shop now button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the hushjet air purifier page.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'

DysonIndiaOfficialWebsitePage.description: This page displays the deals and promotions available on the Dyson India website. It showcases various Dyson products and their features, encouraging users to explore and purchase them.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & Wet Cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best Sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Page title contains 'Deals and Offers | Dyson India'
Header text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is present
Element with text 'Shop now' is present
Element with text 'Featured deals' is present

DysonDealsPage.description: This page displays Dyson deals and promotions, allowing users to browse and purchase discounted products.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum and wet cleaners category.

elements.name: Search products and parts
elements.description: Search input field.

elements.name: Cord-free Vacuums Link
elements.description: Link to Cord-free Vacuums.

elements.name: Corded vacuums Link
elements.description: Link to Corded vacuums.

elements.name: Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners.

elements.name: Wet floor cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to Wet floor cleaners.

elements.name: Shop all vacuum cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to Shop all vacuum cleaners.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Dyson.in exclusive: 24 months no cost EMI'
Page contains the text 'Shop by category'

DysonHairCarePage.description: This page is the Dyson Hair Care landing page, showcasing various hair care products and related information.

elements.name: Hair Care Link
elements.description: Link to the main Hair Care section.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Hair Stylers Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Stylers product category.

elements.name: Hair Dryers Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Dryers product category.

elements.name: Hair Straighteners Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Straighteners product category.

elements.name: Shop all hair care
elements.description: Link to shop all hair care products.

elements.name: Gifts Link
elements.description: Link to the Gifts section.

elements.name: Cases, accessories & attachments Link
elements.description: Link to the Cases, accessories & attachments section.

elements.name: Exclusive Offer Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer popup.

assertions: The 'Hair care' link is highlighted/active in the navigation bar
The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible
At least one hair care product category link is visible (e.g., 'Hair stylers', 'Hair dryers')

DysonAirTreatmentPage.description: This page is the Dyson Air Treatment landing page, focusing on air purifiers and related products.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifier product category page.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Air Purifiers
elements.description: Link to the Air Purifiers product listing page.

elements.name: Purifier + Heaters
elements.description: Link to the Purifier + Heaters product listing page.

elements.name: Shop all air purifiers
elements.description: Link to the Shop all air purifiers product listing page.

elements.name: Close Promotion
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner.

assertions: The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible

DysonHeadphonesPage.description: This page is the Dyson Headphones landing page, showcasing the OnTrac headphones.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the Headphones section of the website.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to search for products and parts.

elements.name: OnTrac Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the OnTrac headphones product page.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product purchase page.

elements.name: Sure, I'll give feedback
elements.description: Button to provide feedback.

elements.name: No thanks
elements.description: Link to decline providing feedback.

elements.name: Dyson Privacy Policy
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Privacy Policy page.

elements.name: Close Exclusive Offer
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer banner.

DysonLightingPage.description: This page is dedicated to showcasing and providing information about Dyson's lighting products.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Lighting Tab
elements.description: Link to the main lighting product page.

elements.name: Dyson Solarcycle Morph
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Solarcycle Morph product page.

elements.name: Shop lighting
elements.description: Link to the shop lighting product page.

elements.name: Exclusive Offer Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer banner.

assertions: Dyson Solarcycle Morph link is present

UnknownPage.description: This is the Dyson Support page, where users can find help, spare parts, and guides for their Dyson products.

elements.name: Search products and parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Solve a problem
elements.description: Link to the troubleshooting tool.

elements.name: Find the right part
elements.description: Link to find spare parts.

elements.name: Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.primary_locator: text=Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.description: Link to user guides and software updates.

elements.name: Start troubleshooting
elements.description: Link to start troubleshooting.

elements.name: Find parts
elements.description: Link to find parts.

elements.name: See all tips and guides
elements.description: Link to see all tips and guides.

assertions: Page contains 'Solve a problem, find spare parts and read expert tips and guides.'
